name: Raven Bee RB500 Exotic Style Guitar
description: This guitar is for those who are ready to amaze others and stand out from the crowd! The unique design of this guitar will be visible from afar.
features:
• -Body wood: alder
  • - Scale length: 25.5
  • - Fingerboard radius: 10-14
  • - Control layout: 1 volume, 1 tone

name: Dickson Studio ER100 Electric Guitar
description: This guitar was first introduced back in 1985 and is still one of the most beloved guitars among our customers.
features:
• - Double cutaway
  • - Solid maple
  • - Scale length: 25.5 in.

name: Dean Doe TRO4506 Electric Guitar
description: A bright guitar for your bright performances. It features a single-cut design, quality maple, and a deep sound you won't be disappointed with.
features:
• - Single cutaway
  • - Scale length: 24.75 in.
  • - Number of frets: 21

name: Raven Classic RT45 Electric Guitar
description: This electric guitar has a classic design and is created for ease of playability. The ultra-thin maple neck makes it easy to use the 22-fret fingerboard.
features:
• - Scale length: 25-1/2
  • - Nut Width: 1.69"(43mm)
  • - Controls: Volume, Tone, 5-way blade pickup selector

name: Deanson VV02 Acoustic Guitar
description: This nice-looking classic guitar has a sweet, articulate sound. It is great for any music styles from fingerpicking to robust strumming.
features:
• - 24 3/4" scale length
  • - Spruce top
  • - Rosewood fingerboard and bridge
  • - Synthetic bone nut and saddle

name: Kuro Music Studio S-35 Acoustic Guitar
description: Here's a great-looking acoustic guitar with a loud, bold sound and excellent features that are great for any musician seeking a well-built and easy-playing instrument.
features:
• - Agathis back and sides
  • - 25-1/2" scale length
  • - Synthetic bone nut and saddle
  • - Slim neck profile

name: Raven RT1 Acoustic-Electric Guitar
description: This affordable instrument is a great entry-level 25.4" scale guitar. It has a nato C-shaped neck, simulated belly bridge, and a simulated rosewood fingerboard.
features:
• - Nut width: 1.69" (43mm)
  • - Number of frets: 20
  • - Pickup/preamp: yes
  • - Preamp EQ: 3-band

name: Fogue RA-090 Acoustic Guitar
description: This guitar is a perfect instrument for the beginner. The body depth and width give you a balanced tone. The guitar is simple and classy, nothing extra.
features:
• - 6-string
  • - 25-3/8" scale length
  • - C-shape neck
  • - 20 frets (14 open)
  • - 1-2/3" nut width
  • - 16" radius
